Reviews.Title: it's complicated.
Reviews.Author: katie b yo.
Reviews.Content: I just got this phone yesterday and the phone is very nice. it's durable and the screen sensativity is wonderful. the only problem I have had with it is that there is no ID number in the phone, so I was on the phone with verizon for 2 hours and still didnt activate the phone, so I have to wait a few days for the manufacurer to email me back to figure out what the ID is.

Reviews.Title: fantastic phone
Reviews.Author: Titus Gyimah
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived in the best condition and everyone who has set an eye on it loves it so much, delivery was timely as scheduled with all accessories intact. This phone is absolutely solid.

ProductInfo.Features:
5+ MP Camera
Internal 4 GB storage, 768 MB RAM
OS Android OS, v2.3.4 (Gingerbread), CPU 1GHz Scorpion processor, Adreno 205 GPU, Qualcomm MSM8255 chipset
Light-up Charm Indicator accessory
Standard battery, Li-Ion 1600 mAh
ProductInfo.Name: HTC Rhyme S510b Brown Unlocked Quadband
